contentrichtext.text: '''Thomas''' or '''Tom Bradley''' may refer to: *[[Tom Bradley (American politician)]] (1917–1998), mayor of Los Angeles, California *[[Tom Bradley (author)]], American novelist and essayist *[[Tom Bradley (UK politician)]] (1926–2002), British Member of Parliament and trade union leader *[[Tom Bradley (baseball)]] (born 1947), former American Major Leagues baseball player *[[Tom Bradley (American football)]] (born 1956), American football coach and former player *[[Thomas Bradley (priest)]] (1596/7–1673), Anglican clergyman, chaplain to the King *[[Thomas J. Bradley]] (1870–1901), U.S. Representative from New York *[[Thomas W. Bradley]] (1844–1920), U.S. Representative from New York and Medal of Honor recipient *[[Thomas Bradley (physician)]] (1751–1813), English physician and editor *[[Tom Bradley International Terminal]] {{hndis|Bradley, Tom}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bradley, Tom}}
